1.text:
### May 1995: The language which will be known as Javascript is being written in a 10 day sprint... 
 By who?

2.text:
### The author of Javascript had to rush because it was going to be crammed into the release of... 
 Which browser?

3.text:
### Javascript has had a lot of names over the years. 
 Which one of these names *hasn't* the language been known by?

7.text:
### 2005: and a white paper was just released about 'AJAX': asynchronous JavaScript and XML. 
 Which of these sites became its premier showcase in the years to come?

8.text: ### September 2008: The open-source V8 Javascript Engine is being released... by who and for what?
options: The Chromium Project for Google Chrome

9.text:
### February 2009: V8 helps bring Javascript to the server via node.js. 
 One of node.js's most powerful features is 'non-blocking I/O', based on a single-thread event loop.  What design pattern is this leveraging?
